name: @niivue/jupyter
description: A JupyterLab extension for viewing NIfTI files with Niivue

scripts.build: pnpm run build:assets && pnpm run build:lib && pnpm run build:labextension:dev
scripts.build:prod: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build:assets && pnpm run build:lib:prod && pnpm run build:labextension
scripts.build:assets: cd ../../packages/niivue-react && BUILD_TARGET=vscode pnpm build && mkdir -p ../../apps/jupyter/static/niivue && rm -rf ../../apps/jupyter/static/niivue/* && rsync -av --exclude='build' --exclude='*.html' --exclude='manifest.webmanifest' --exclude='registerSW.js' --exclude='sw.js' --exclude='workbox-*.js' dist/ ../../apps/jupyter/static/niivue/
scripts.clean: rimraf lib tsconfig.tsbuildinfo .tsbuildinfo .webpack-cache jupyterlab_niivue/labextension jupyterlab_niivue/_version.py .eslintcache .stylelintcache static/niivue build *.egg-info
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:eslint && pnpm run lint:prettier && pnpm run lint:style
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm run lint:eslint --fix && pnpm run lint:prettier --write && pnpm run lint:style --fix
scripts.release:test: pnpm run clean:all && pnpm run build:prod && python -m build --wheel && python -m twine upload --repository testpypi dist/*
scripts.release:prod: pnpm run clean:all && pnpm run build:prod && python -m build --wheel && python -m twine upload dist/*
scripts.release:check: pnpm run clean:all && pnpm run build:prod && python -m build --wheel && python -m twine check dist/*
